page.title: 04THE LOCAL BOYS CLUB
page.content: TREORCHY AND CWMPARC BOYS CLUB WAS {FOUNDED}IN THE{1920'S}.IT CATERED FOR BOYS 12-18 YEARS OF AGE AND PROVIDED THEM WITH FOOTBALL,BASKETBALL,SNOOKER AND TABLE-TENNIS.THE BOYS HAD TO PAY 1PENNY PER WEEK AS CONTRIBUTIONS.TODAY THEY ARE AS YOUNG AS 7 AND LEAVE TO ATTEND THE LOCAL YOUTH CENTRE AT 15.CONTRIBUTIONS ARE 20PENCE PER WEEK AND AN INITIAL COST OF 50PENCE TO JOIN.IT IS OPEN EVERY NIGHT EXCEPT SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS PROVIDING THE SAME FACILITIES AS IT DID IN THE PAST.MEMBERSHIP IS LOWER TODAY AS THERE ARE NOW MORE PLACES FOR BOYS TO ATTEND. PAST MEMBERS OF THE CLUB,{ALAN CURTIS AND{GERAINT WILLIAMS},ARE CURRENTLY PLAYING IN THE ENGLISH FOOTBALL LEAGUE FOR SOUTHAMPTON AND DERBY RESPECTIVELY AND THE WELSH NATIONAL SOCCER TEAM.
